title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using Laravel, integrating payment gateways, product management, and order tracking. Implemented a responsive design and optimized the platform for scalability and performance.
class: sm:self-end col-span-12 sm:col-span-7 md:col-span-8 lg:col-span-5 lg:col-start-3

title: Project Management Tool
description: Built a project management tool that allows teams to collaborate, track progress, and manage tasks efficiently. Utilized Laravel’s robust ORM for seamless database interactions and implemented real-time notifications using WebSockets.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Created a social media dashboard that aggregates content from multiple social platforms, providing analytics and scheduling tools for content management. Integrated third-party APIs and ensured data security with Laravel’s built-in authentication.

title: Learning Management System (LMS)
description: Developed a Learning Management System that supports course creation, user enrollment, and progress tracking. Implemented role-based access control and utilized Laravel’s queue system for handling background tasks efficiently.

title: Real Estate Listing Platform
description: Built a real estate listing platform with advanced search capabilities, property management features, and user profiles. Leveraged Laravel's powerful routing and blade templating system to create a seamless user experience.
class: sm:self-end col-span-12 sm:col-span-7 md:col-span-8 lg:col-span-5 lg:col-start-3

title: Custom CRM Solution
description: Designed and developed a custom CRM solution to manage client interactions, sales pipelines, and customer support. Integrated with third-party services like email and calendar APIs to provide a unified experience.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: Created an online learning platform where users can sign up for courses, track their progress, and earn certifications. Built an intuitive admin panel for course management and analytics.

title: Job Portal
description: Developed a job portal that connects employers with potential candidates. Features include job listings, application tracking, and advanced search filters. Integrated payment options for premium job postings.

title: Event Management System
description: Built an event management system that allows users to create, manage, and attend events. Implemented features like ticket booking, calendar integration, and real-time notifications.

title: Inventory Management System
description: Developed an inventory management system for tracking products, managing suppliers, and generating reports. Integrated barcode scanning for quick updates and streamlined inventory control.
class: sm:self-end col-span-12 sm:col-span-7 md:col-span-8 lg:col-span-5 lg:col-start-3

title: Travel Booking Platform
description: Created a travel booking platform that allows users to book flights, hotels, and rental cars. Implemented a robust search engine and integrated third-party APIs for real-time availability and pricing.

title: Online Marketplace
description: Built an online marketplace where users can buy and sell products. Features include product listings, user reviews, and secure payment processing. Implemented a scalable architecture to handle high traffic volumes.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: Developed a fitness tracking app that allows users to set goals, track workouts, and monitor progress over time. Integrated with wearable devices for real-time data synchronization and personalized recommendations.

title: Real-Time Chat Application
description: Created a real-time chat application using Laravel and WebSockets. Users can engage in private and group chats, share media files, and receive instant notifications. Implemented a modern, responsive UI for an optimal user experience.
